Description:
Dream Locale To Build Your Dream Home
This attractive allotment is found at the prestigious RACV Resort Creswick. The parcel is approx. 503m2 in size with a fabulous frontage of 21 meters that will easily hold a larger dwelling. Any home constructed would grant amazing views over the course, with greens, bunkers, fairways and dams all within chipping distance. There are beautiful gum trees, walking & mountain bike tracks to enjoy, kangaroos and birdlife as well. The block is the shortest of strolls to the 19th hole to take advantage of the bar and restaurant. The Resort is 2 minutes to the hub of town, 10 minutes to Ballarat and 25 minutes to Daylesford. With Melbourne just an hour away, any home built could also be the perfect weekender. Investors should note the township has the lowest possible rental vacancy percentage. If you think your family deserves the loveliest of lifestyles, you should consider this allotment.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Country Aspect On Half Acre Block & Great Shedding
Situated between Creswick and Daylesford in Smeaton is this neat 3 bedroom home on just over half an acre with great shedding. Everything is straight and square for you to move straight in and just update as you go. Three good sized bedrooms all with built-in-robes. Open plan kitchen/dining zone with sun room or study. The kitchen has seen a recent renovation. The bathroom too has been refurbished. Large lounge with views to the outside allowing you to take in the country vistas over the rolling hills. Outside the large 9.5 x 17.5m shed is a tradies dream with concrete flooring, two phase power and large sliding doors. There is also a separate 8.5 x 7m lock up garage. Other features of the home include, gas bottled central heating, back porch/sitting room, town water, septic tank and easy care gardens. This is a great opportunity for those looking to capitalize on all the advantages of country living but without all the hard work.

Description:
38 acres approx. of Rural Living (STCA)
With direct access from Ballarat-Maryborough Rd, Dunach this property is ideally located for your rural lifestyle. On the outskirts of Talbot this terrific property has plenty of interest in the undulating landscape with views in every direction, great for bike riding or just getting back to nature. Mature Gums, with large clearing ideal for potential home site (STCA).
Includes a small Atco for office/bungalow. Three large shipping containers are available for sale. Lot 3 (30 acres approx.) to the rear is also available for sale. Includes town water and school bus passing by front.
10 minutes to Clunes, 15 minutes to Maryborough & 40 minutes to Ballarat.
For more information please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456 908

Description:
5.5 acres (2.2ha) approx. in Township Zone
**Under Offer**
Wonderful lifestyle opportunity!
Situated in the highly prized location just north of Ballarat, 20km from Daylesford and 9km from Newlyn, is this opportunity to secure wonderful lifestyle block, uniquely situated in the Township Zone (TZ).
With a stunning rural backdrop and tranquillity galore, this parcel has a planning permit pending for a dwelling with the Hepburn Shire, which would make the complete rural lifestyle getaway with your dream home being the finishing touch (STCA).
The property has catchment dam, a large mature gum tree and sealed road frontage.
**Note there is a 20 acre parcel directly adjoining to the south of this block, which is also available for sale. Contact agent for combined price.
Secure your dream lifestyle block now!
DEPOSIT: 10%
SETTLEMENT: 30/60 days
For further documentation and inspection contact:

137 Gillies Street, Ballarat, VIC 3350, Australia

Address: 1605 McCallums Creek Road Mount Glasgow VIC 3371
Description:
2 Storey Mud Brick Home on 5 acres
This rustic mud brick & cedar home is versatile in its layout depending on your needs. Enter via the country kitchen with slate floor, through to the cosy central lounge with bay window. Dbl glass doors open into the huge 8x6m family room, which would also work as the master bedroom. Features leadlight windows & split system for extra comfort. The rumpus room is ideally situated on the lower level also with 5th bedroom potential. Bathroom/laundry completes the downstairs area. Upstairs 3 bedrooms plus 2x study/storage/dressing rooms and plumbing for future ensuite.
Features:
3,4 or 5 Bedrooms plus 2x study/storage/walk-in dressing rooms
Timber country kitchen including wood stove & electric upright
Large Living or 4th bedroom
Rumpus Room or 5th bedroom
Large Shedding
3 small Dams
Lovely views of Mt Grenoch
Centrally located close to Talbot, Clunes and Maryborough
For more information please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908

Address: 8 Newlyn Reservoir Road Newlyn North VIC 3364
Description:
The Old Newlyn Bakery with Original Bakers Oven
This iconic Newlyn property is located just 15 minutes from Daylesford and 25 minutes to Ballarat and boasts a number of original features including high ceilings, decorative fretwork, open fireplaces, and original timber floors. The central hallway links 3 good sized bedrooms with ensuite and open fire in master. The country style kitchen has plenty of storage, lounge features a bay window and wood fire and the light filled sunroom has long view overlooking the adjoining farmland.
- Approx. 1.5 acres on title with further agricultural lease to Birch creek zoned township
- Town water, mains power, septic system, NBN internet, bottled gas
- Open wood fire, fan forced wood heater, gas hydronic heating
- Established gardens with large walnut trees and numerous fruit producing trees
- Original bakers oven built 1888 in bakehouse, with proving room
- Automatic entry gates, 4 bay concreted Colourbond® shed, fully fenced dog proof yard
Inspection are available by private appointment and highly recommended.

Description:
Stunning Creswick Family Home That Ticks All the Boxes
Located in thriving Creswick and close to shops, public transport and parklands is this Beautifully presented J.G. King family home. Under 5 years old and still covered under the builders guarantee, from the moment you enter the front door you are aware of the luxury and quality on offer.
4 spacious carpeted bedrooms, the master with Ensuite and walk in robes along with BIRs to all the other bedrooms. Central heating and evaporative cooling make sure you are always in your perfect climate.
The kitchen is king in this home with a stainless steel 900m electric oven with gas cooktop, rangehood and dishwasher and plumbed central island bench.
Open plan living shines through with the Spacious dining zone leading to great living/family area with coonara wood heating and a lovely vista of the rear garden and sliding door access to the alfresco entertaining area.
An extra deep double remote garage with internal access and the bonus of a separate 2 bay shed and workshop with concrete floor.
Add to this a spacious and private rear garden with a treed aspect, solar hot water system, additional secured space for your vehicles all on a family sized block of 730m2(approx).
Quality JG King Home
Double Garage & 2 bay Shed
Quality family home
Central to everything

Description:
OAK FARM - UNIQUE RURAL LUXURY LIVING CLOSE TO DAYLESFORD
Ideally situated amidst premium farmland near the quiet town of Newlyn just 7 minutes from Daylesford, 10 mins from Creswick and 20 mins from Ballarat is this beautifully appointed and spacious residence on 5 acres. Oak Farm is an immaculately presented country retreat and is close to the Newlyn Reservoir, Hepburn Regional Park, Hepburn Lagoon and Newlyn recreation reserve. Offering the best of country living with room for a horse, a goat or two, alpacas or some sheep with beautiful country views all within a relaxed country lifestyle.
Perfect for permanent or weekend living on a grand scale with huge living areas and luxury quality finishes throughout. The main residence features 3 large bedrooms with a WIR & ensuite with corner spa in master, main family bathroom with bath, large open plan kitchen/dining with generous bench space, plenty of storage and a full laundry/mudroom. The separate large garden studio would suit many purposes and is ideal as a guesthouse, artists retreat or family room, complete with private bathroom, split system heating/cooling and sitting area.
This rural entertainer boasts an alfresco decking adjoining the main kitchen with a wood fired pizza oven and long picturesque views over the countryside and your own 400 Oak Tree Wood-lot. The fully landscaped gardens are exquisite and feature hedges, lawns, established trees, edible gardens and numerous fruit trees. Divided into 4 paddocks, it is fully fenced with large well laid out vegetable gardens, glasshouse, newly planted fruit trees & poultry enclosure. Rich, deep, red volcanic soils will yield great results with endless water through a new 100m deep groundwater bore. .
Mains power, bottled gas, bore water with 68,000 litres tank storage, new septic wastewater system, solar-gas boosted HWS, NBN internet,
Gas ducted heating, split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans
4 car high-bay garage, with concreted floor, mains power & wood heater
6.7 m x 1.5 m wood shed and separate tool shed, with mains power
Fully irrigated throughout via a new water bore and pump system.
Inspection is highly recommended at one of the scheduled open times

Description:
LIVE THE LIFESTYLE DREAM
Have you been searching for a house on a couple of acres to run some stock, where you have room for a shed, where the children can run around outside instead of being locked up playing x-box in a small unit? Then how about a tree change!
Located just 20 minutes out of Ballarat and 2 minutes from Creswick we present this three bedroom, brick veneer home. With a north facing living room allowing natural light, fantastic floorboards throughout the living area and bedrooms, a reverse cycle air conditioner and a wood heater - this well designed home is made for comfort.
The property is situated on approximately 1.8 acres with a great yard perfect for keeping the dog secure, with a paddock at the back perfect for a horse, donkey, a couple of sheep or maybe even an alpaca. Behind the house we have a greenhouse perfect for green thumbs. This property includes town supplied water and power.
This is not a property we expect to last long so enquire today.

Description:
A GORGEOUS, ELEVATED HOME IN CRESWICK
3
Situated just outside the incredibly popular township of Creswick is this gorgeous three bedroom weatherboard home surrounded by beautiful bushland on around 1.8 acres (approx.). The home has recently been updated with a new bathroom, new carpet and fresh paintwork throughout. There is loads of living space here with a large lounge room and open plan kitchen and meals area. Outside is where this property really impresses with a stunning and spacious veranda, a three car garage with adjoining workshop and a separate garden shed. All of this on a very manageable 1.8 acres (approx.) mixture of beautiful bush and cleared land backing onto the Creswick State Forrest. This will go fast.

Description:
Fabulous Townhouse Offering Convenience & Comfort
This young townhouse is the perfect home for your retirement or maybe addition to your port-folio. The abode is a surprisingly spacious three bedroom property. Each bedroom taking your larger suites for you and your guests while the bathroom works as a semi ensuite. The roomy lounge is open plan to the dining and very functional kitchen. The home has all the modern kitchen appliances expected of a new home and all being stainless steel finished including the dishwasher. The dwelling has earthy tones throughout bringing a sense of warmth, as does the gas central heating for our approaching winter. Its locale is fabulous with a two minute walk having you in the hub of town and enjoying your favourite coffee shop. Lindsay Park will also entertain you with football, cricket, netball and soccer at your door. Or maybe you would enjoy becoming a member at the Creswick Bowls Clubs for a bowl or just being social. They don't come neater or sweeter, come view today.

Description:
Stunning Family Home On 4 Private Acres
Nestled amid the beauty of the natural landscape, this truly unique property is offered for sale for the first time for the discerning buyer looking for an opulent country escape within 20 minutes of Ballarat & Daylesford and less than 90 minutes to the Melbourne CBD.
Providing seclusion, comfort & position, this enchanting home set on approx 4 acres is ideal for growing families & outdoor enthusiasts, with horse stables, adjoining timber shed, workshop & tackle rooms with concrete floors, along with plenty of land to wander, ride, hike or explore.
Architecturally designed with family & entertaining at its heart & constructed with recycled brick, Tasmanian oak & sparkling pine ceilings, every room has charming views onto woodland or landscaped gardens, with multiple living zones adding versatility to this opulent four bedroom floor plan.
The 7 x 5m master suite is delightfully finished with walk in robes& private ensuite while three further bedrooms host either built in robes or walk in robes, wall to wall carpet, each with its own stunning vista. Offering a claw foot bath, a generous vanity with cedar doors & a separate toilet along with a living wall garden to make you feel truly pampered, the central bathroom is truly a sanctuary.
In addition, you are offered a truly grand spa room with Tassie oak walls, ceilings & full-length windows which provide 180 degree panoramic views across the land, along with a separate fully equipped sauna room.
Open in design, the kitchen serves as the central hub of the home. Providing views to the garden, with a dramatic timber rangehood accentuating the impeccable thought & design of this home.
The accompanying living & family zones offer high cathedral ceilings, exposed timber beams & 130 year old delicate stain-glass transom windows, along with a vintage Goden' French wood heater & timber doors leading you to one of the stunning external alfresco entertaining areas overlooking the gardens, paddock & dam.
This property is well serviced with two acres fenced into paddocks, a double carport with an additional storage workshop (with hot & cold water), along with central & electric heating, 3 solid fuel heaters, ceiling fans, a dam, a fire pit, septic & 19,000L of water storage.
For further information, please contact our agent today for full details.

Description:
10 acres for the horse enthusiast
Nestled in the popular outskirts of Creswick this 10acre property has been lovingly setup for the horse enthusiast. Divided into 5 paddocks all with electrified fencing and bore water piped to troughs. Look out over the property from all angles, including views of Mt Blowhard. Relax after a days works in the spa bath in bathroom, then sit outside and enjoy a BBQ in the undercover area. The home comprises 3 bedrooms, all with new carpet, the open plan living/dining has easy care floating laminate flooring, and a well appointed kitchen, with views to the East of the property. Enclosed house yard complete with chook house. Behind the house there are two lined stables in an small paddock with lighting, perfect when foaling down mares. Sundry shedding includes: 20ft shipping container, feed shed with power and concrete.
Inspection is a must, to appreciate this property.

Description:
Elevated Scenic Views Ready for your New Home (STCA)
A rare opportunity awaits to have the opportunity to build your dream family home (STCA) on this approximate 23 acre parcel of land. Boasting a combination of scattered trees, cleared land and your own private dam, the opportunities are endless. One of the best features of this property are the rolling country vistas that combined with the peace and tranquility makes for the perfect escape. Complete with an approved planning permit and electricity already connected, this could be just what you have been seeking. Being less than 5 minutes to Creswick, 10 minutes to Ballarat and easy access to the Western Freeway, properties of this nature are often sought but seldom found. Be sure to call today find out more.

Description:
LIVE THE DREAM
Rare opportunity to secure quality lifestyle property offering a brick veneer home with space and character and approx. 135 acres of fertile land. The home features two main bedrooms with an optional third bedroom/sunroom/study, kitchen with electric stove and pantry, large dining, two spacious living areas, bathroom with separate bath and shower, laundry, ducted evaporative cooling and split system air conditioner in lounge. A semi-detached bungalow provides potential additional living or utility space. Abundant shedding provides plenty of space for vehicles, storage and workshop area. The property is serviced by mains power, tank and bore water. The attractive acreage is suitable for mixed farming and grazing and has McCullum's Creek running through the rear of the property. Call for details and inspection.

Description:
A Church Street Delight With Bush Views
This home is a far cry from the hectic pace of city life, with peaceful surrounds along with conveniences close at hand.
Neat & tidy, with just one bordering neighbour, this brick veneer home offers three good size bedrooms, a fresh family bathroom, a cosy lounge & a generous living area connected to the casual meals area & bright kitchen.
A freestanding combustion heater warms the entire home with ease, while ceiling fans & a split system ensure the home is temperature controlled all year round.
Bespoke timber floors & contemporary tones also create a warm environment for family & friends, while the smart U' shaped kitchen with electric cooking is designed with complete connection to the living zones & outdoor alfresco area.
The elevated deck offers neighbouring views of the State Forest Reserve to the rear, while it also provides a great space to sit & relax, overlooking the 830m2 allotment.
A double carport has been designed to the side, while a handy garden shed is tucked around the established trees which feature throughout the garden. A colorbond fence keeps the yard & home private, with enough room along the concreted driveway for further cars to park off the street.
Church Street provides not only serene environment, it also ensures you are within minutes from the thriving town centre of Creswick. With just 20 minutes to Ballarat and similar to Daylesford, this home with town water & NBN connection is the perfect slice of real estate for young families just starting out, especially with many facilities & amenities on offer within the township.
This home represents great value to first home buyers, young families, downsizers & investors alike. Call our agent today for further details and for inspection times.

Description:
Stunning Victorian Residence / Retail / Development opportunity right in the heart of the Creswick CBD
This gorgeous home and business is positioned to perfection right in the central business district of the Creswick township. Featuring stunning period features this home has all the charm of yesteryear including polished timber Baltic flooring, high ceilings, gorgeous cornicing, magnificent open fire surrounds, gas heating and functional kitchen and bathroom. Situated on approx. 831m2 of land this beautiful property is currently known as ‘Cottage Mart’ with stall holders sharing space with a common commercial goal. Returning approx. $450 per week this is an outstanding opportunity to set yourself up for the future and buy a wonderful investment property reaping immediate rewards with wonderful tenants who would love to stay on. With development opportunity right in the heart of the bustling Creswick central business district don’t miss this rare opportunity. Call now too book your private viewing today.

Description:
Stop Dreaming & Build!
Situated in thriving Creswick, this attractive family sized block of land on approx. 725m2 is the ideal spot for building your dream home (STCA). With all services ready to connect and fencing to all internal boundaries, you would be hard pressed to find a better block on the market today!
Creswick offers everything you will need right at your door step. From the supermarket to cosy cafes, and from highly rated Government and Catholic primary schools to handy buses and the V/Line Service to Melbourne, all the bases are covered for you here.
With a short 15 minute drive to the centre of Ballarat, 20 minutes to the spas and restaurants of Beautiful Dayslesford and easy access to Melbourne via the Western Freeway, this block really does stack up as a great opportunity for the astute purchaser.
• Flat and easy to build block
• Close to all amenities
• Internal fencing included
• All services ready to connect
